thread.title: UK Wage Data Lowers Expectations for 2025 Bank of England Rate Cuts
thread.title_full: UK Wage Data Lowers Expectations for 2025 Bank of England Rate Cuts

author: @gurufocus
title: UK Wage Data Lowers Expectations for 2025 Bank of England Rate Cuts
text:
Following the release of UK wage data, the currency market has reduced expectations for the Bank of England's interest rate cuts in 2025. Traders now anticipate a total rate cut of approximately 59 basis points by December 2025, equivalent to two 25 basis point reductions. The likelihood of three rate cuts has decreased to less than 40%, down from 90% before the data release.
UK Wage Data Lowers Expectations for 2025 Bank of England Rate Cuts
1 hours ago
